title: Autumn Awakening (and Garden Graveyard!): Preparing for Cool-Season Planting

tasks.task: Perform general farm cleanup and planting tasks.
subtasks: Cut dead parts off mint plants.
Identify and trim back unhealthy strawberry plants.
Remove and compost old eggplant plants.
Prepare and plant new carrot seeds in the eggplant bed.
Clear out and replant the cucumber bed with beetroot seeds and additional soil amendments.
Harvest and save garlic chive seeds.
Transplant pepper tree into a pot with soil and mulch.
Over seed and thin beetroot plants.
Plant basil in various areas for aroma and bee attraction.
Check on mushroom cultivation in the grow house.

So in total, 7 subtasks under the main MAINTASK. This captures all the physical activities the person is performing in the video transcript.
MAINTASK: Perform general farm cleanup and planting tasks.
subtasks: Identify and manage mint plants by cutting dead parts and determining variety (apple mint) before transferring to a new basket.
Remove old eggplant, enrich the soil with piggy post and earthworm castings, and sow carrot seeds in the eggplant bed.
Clear the cucumber bed of garlic chives, prepare the soil with organic matter, and plant beetroot seeds.
Transplant the pepper tree into a pot with appropriate soil mix, mulch, stake, and tie for support.
Harvest and save garlic chive seeds for future use, then plant basil in designated areas for scent and pollinator attraction.
Check mushroom cultivation in the grow house to ensure proper conditions for growth.
Mix organic matter into beds to improve soil quality for planting.
